text: mAqruqtama#si maqrutAqmOjaq iti# kRuqShNaM ~MvAsa#H kRuqShNatU#ShaqM pari# dhatta Eqtadvai vRuShTyai# rUqpa(gm) sarU#pa Eqva BUqtvA paqrjanya#M ~Mvar.Shayatiraqmaya#ta marutaH SyEqnamAqyinaqmiti# paScAdvAqtaM prati# mIvati purOvAqtamEqva ja#nayati vaqrq.ShasyA va#ruddhyai vAtanAqmAni# juhOti vAqyurvai vRuShTyA# ISE vAqyumEqva svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq sa EqvAsmai# paqrjanya#M ~Mvar.ShayatyaqShTau - [  ]  23
